query:
WITH jobs_to_resume AS (
            SELECT 
                jq.id
            FROM 
                v2_job_queue jq 
            INNER JOIN v2_job j ON j.id = jq.id 
            WHERE 
                j.workspace_id = $1 AND 
                jq.suspend = $2 AND 
                jq.canceled_by IS NULL
        )
        UPDATE 
            v2_job_queue 
        SET 
            suspend = 0, 
            scheduled_for = NOW()
        WHERE 
            id IN (SELECT id FROM jobs_to_resume)
